val.title: Dublin Transit Center Parking Garage

Applicant.name: County of Alameda General Services Agency

Project Planner.name: Bernadette Delgado - Medical Capital Program Manager, County of Alameda General Services Agency

docs.name: Environmental Document: Alameda County Board of Supervisors June 4, 2019 Agenda

val.description: The proposed Dublin Transit Center Parking Garage Project near the Dublin/Pleasanton BART station will have a capacity for over 500 parking spaces for Tri-Valley area commuters, including priority vanpool parking and Electric Vehicle (EV) charging stations. The project promote and increase BART ridership and to advance the Dublin/Pleasanton BART Capacity Improvement and Congestion Reduction Program. Alameda Countyâ€™s General Services Agency will be responsible for day-to-day management of garage design and construction. For additional information on this project contact:
